name: First Mid Bancshares, Inc.
description: First Mid Bancshares, Inc. is a leading financial institution located in the Midwest, primarily engaged in offering a broad range of banking and financial services. Established in 1982, the company has steadily expanded its footprint through organic growth and strategic acquisitions. First Mid operates as a bank holding company for First Mid Bank & Trust, which provides services including personal banking, commercial banking, and investment services. The company prides itself on its commitment to customer service and community involvement, ensuring that it meets the unique financial needs of its clients while contributing to the economic development of the regions it serves. With a focus on innovation, First Mid has embraced digital banking solutions to enhance customer experience and increase accessibility. The company's mission is to deliver superior financial services while maintaining a strong emphasis on integrity and trust. First Mid Bancshares remains dedicated to building lasting relationships with its clients, helping them achieve their financial goals through tailored solutions.

seo.meta_title: First Mid Bancshares, Inc. | Banking and Financial Services in the Midwest
seo.meta_description: Explore First Mid Bancshares, Inc., a trusted financial institution offering comprehensive banking and investment services. Learn about our commitment to customer service and community.

faq.question: What services does First Mid Bancshares offer?
faq.answer: First Mid Bancshares offers a variety of services including personal banking, commercial banking, and investment services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of First Mid Bancshares?
faq.answer: Jeffrey J. Baugh is the CEO of First Mid Bancshares, Inc.

faq.question: Where is First Mid Bancshares headquartered?
faq.answer: First Mid Bancshares is headquartered in Mattoon, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: When was First Mid Bancshares founded?
faq.answer: First Mid Bancshares was founded in 1982.
